mapper.select: select e.name as 'name',e.id as 'id',d.`name` as 'depname', p.`name` as 'postname', e.address as 'address',e.age,e.phone,e.education,e.entrytime,e.sex,e.basesalary, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,e.entrytime,NOW()) as 'gongling',e.level,e.politicalstatus from t_employee e,t_department d,t_post p where e.departid = d.id and e.postid = p.id and e.gonghao = #{gonghao}
